NIGHT_SQUID.name: Night Squid
NIGHT_SQUID.spawnMessage: Pitch Darkness reveals you've caught a Night Squid.

FROZEN_STEVE.name: Frozen Steve
FROZEN_STEVE.spawnMessage: Frozen Steve fell into the pond long ago, never to resurface...until now!

NURSE_SHARK.name: Nurse Shark
NURSE_SHARK.spawnMessage: A tiny fin emerges from the water, you've caught a Nurse Shark.

SEA_GUARDIAN.name: Sea Guardian
SEA_GUARDIAN.spawnMessage: You've stumbled upon a Sea Guardian.

FROSTY.name: Frosty
FROSTY.spawnMessage: It's a snowman! He looks harmless

SEA_WITCH.name: Sea Witch
SEA_WITCH.spawnMessage: It looks like you've disrupted the Sea Witch's brewing session. Watch out, she's furious!

BLUE_SHARK.name: Blue Shark
BLUE_SHARK.spawnMessage: You spot a fin as blue as the water it came from, it's a Blue Shark.

SEA_ARCHER.name: Sea Archer
SEA_ARCHER.spawnMessage: You reeled in a Sea Archer.

MONSTER_OF_THE_DEEP.name: Monster of The Deep
MONSTER_OF_THE_DEEP.spawnMessage: The Monster of the Deep has emerged.

GRINCH.name: Grinch
GRINCH.spawnMessage: The Grinch stole Jerry's gifts... Get them back!

NIGHTMARE.name: Nightmare
NIGHTMARE.spawnMessage: You hear trotting from beneath the waves, you caught a Nightmare.

CARROT_KING.name: Carrot King
CARROT_KING.spawnMessage: Is this even a Fish? It's the Carrot King!

GUARDIAN_DEFENDER.name: Guardian Defender
GUARDIAN_DEFENDER.spawnMessage: You've discovered a Guardian Defender of the sea.

WAREWOLF.name: Warewolf
WAREWOLF.spawnMessage: It must be a full moon, a Werewolf appears.

TIGER_SHARK.name: Tiger Shark
TIGER_SHARK.spawnMessage: A striped beast bounds from the depths, the wild Tiger Shark!

DEEP_SEA_PROTECTOR.name: Deep Sea Protector
DEEP_SEA_PROTECTOR.spawnMessage: You have awoken the Deep Sea Protector, prepare for a battle!

WATER_HYDRA.name: Water Hydra
WATER_HYDRA.spawnMessage: The Water Hydra has come to test your strength.

SEA_EMPEROR.name: Sea Emperor
SEA_EMPEROR.spawnMessage: The Sea Emperor arises from the depths.

PHANTOM_FISHER.name: Phantom Fisher
PHANTOM_FISHER.spawnMessage: The spirit of a long lost Phantom Fisher has come to haunt you.

GREAT_WHITE_SHARK.name: Great White Shark
GREAT_WHITE_SHARK.spawnMessage: Hide no longer, a Great White Shark has tracked your scent and thirsts for your blood!

GRIM_REAPER.name: Grim Reaper
GRIM_REAPER.spawnMessage: This can't be! The manifestation of death himself!

LAVA_PIGMAN.name: Lava Pigman
LAVA_PIGMAN.spawnMessage: A Lava Pigman arose from the depths!

LAVA_BLAZE.name: Lava Blaze
LAVA_BLAZE.spawnMessage: A Lava Blaze has surfaced from the depths!
